title: love and my iron chef
description: AN AMAZON HOT NEW RELEASE AND AMAZON BEST SELLER !As Amani frantically diced the ingredients for her Pan seared Mahi-Mahi with Mango Salsa, she recalled her first meeting with him during a class he taught on the presentation of food and organization the previous year. Amani had been immediately drawn to the tall, serious Californian, and not just because of his looks. With dark wavy hair, strong features and the deepest blue eyes she had ever seen short of Paul Newmanâ€™s, David Spencer was everything Amani admired in a man, and then some.During class, watching his hands work his food, Amani had wondered what those hands would feel like stroking her back and hips. She wondered what it would feel like to cuddle into his embrace, his broad and well-muscled arms enveloping her in their heated cocoon. David was no slouch, but somewhat of a fitness freak outside of the kitchen. Not only was he an adept surfer, he was also, according to gossip, an experienced rock climber.......
author: Joanna Hynes
